name: etFactaEstLux
description:
Note:
This is my first game! As a learning exercise I'm going to release one game every moth starting today. I don't consider this a good game or even the best I can do. I forced my self to stop working on it so I that can move on to another project and build on the things I have learned. This game still has many bugs and lacks a goal as well as an appropriate amount of player feedback (and a menu...)
I may come back to this project at a later point.

Description:
In this game you don't play as a specific character. Instead you are energy which is passed around between many characters and plants.
-You can eat other characters and plants by walking into them.
-If you don't eat for a while you die and you become a flower
-If you collide with someone bigger than you are consumed by him but you also get the control over him.
-If you collide with someone who is the same size as you both split
-If you get to big you also split

Controls:
Keyboard:
WASD - Control plants/Walk
Mouse - Look around
Space - Grow plants/Jump
R - Restart

Gamepad:
Left stick - Control plants/Walk
Right stick - Look around
A-Button - Grow plants/Jump
Both triggers - Restart

Credits:
Game: Peter Jaschkowske(@P_Jaschkowske)
Music: SKRID
